data.title: Add titles in Final Cut Pro for Mac
data.meta_description: In Final Cut Pro for Mac, add a title to your project and then enter text for the title.
data.text:
Browse a single category of titles: Click a title category below Titles in the sidebar.

To view the title categories, click the Titles disclosure triangle.

Browse a single category of titles: Click a title category below Titles in the sidebar.

To view the title categories, click the Titles disclosure triangle.

Add a title between clips in the timeline: Drag the title from the browser to the edit point between the clips where you want the title clip to appear.
